dishes.reason_for_strategy: High-quality branded complete Caesar salad entries were found in the USDA database that compositionally match the observed dish, containing romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, and Parmesan cheese. This approach provides a more holistic nutritional profile for the combined dish components than an ingredient-level breakdown.
dishes.usda_source_description: CAESAR SALAD (Type: Branded, Brand: Taylor Fresh Foods, Inc.)
dishes.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 1916135 (CAESAR SALAD, Taylor Fresh Foods, Inc.) because: (1) It is a branded product explicitly named 'Caesar Salad' with a high relevance score. (2) Its ingredient list (Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese) closely matches the primary components observed in the image. (3) This FDC ID represents a complete, pre-packaged salad, aligning with the likely commercial origin of the dish. (4) It was preferred over other branded options due to its clear ingredient breakdown and high score, and over 'Caesar Pasta Salad' entries which are compositionally different.

dishes.reason_for_strategy: No suitable complete dish-level FDC IDs for 'Penne Pasta Salad' were found in the USDA database that accurately matched the observed dish's specific components (penne pasta, creamy tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, feta cheese) without significant compositional discrepancies (e.g., presence of tuna, smoked mozzarella, or bacon/cheddar). Therefore, an ingredient-level calculation strategy is necessary to ensure accurate nutritional analysis by matching individual components.

ingredients.usda_source_description: Pasta, cooked, enriched, with added salt (Type: SR Legacy)
ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 169751 (Pasta, cooked, enriched, with added salt) because: (1) It is a generic SR Legacy entry for cooked pasta, which is compositionally appropriate for the penne pasta observed. (2) The 'enriched' and 'with added salt' descriptors are common for commercial pasta products. (3) This FDC ID provides a reliable nutritional profile for the main carbohydrate component of the dish. (4) It was preferred over other cooked pasta entries due to its commonality and high relevance score, and over raw pasta or non-pasta items.

ingredients.usda_source_description: CREAMY TOMATO SAUCE (Type: Branded, Brand: Finlay Extracts & Ingredients USA, Inc.)
ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 1900770 (CREAMY TOMATO SAUCE, Finlay Extracts & Ingredients USA, Inc.) because: (1) It is a branded product with an exact name match ('Creamy Tomato Sauce'). (2) Its ingredient list explicitly includes cream and tomatoes, confirming its compositional relevance to the observed sauce. (3) This FDC ID directly represents the specific type of sauce used in the dish, ensuring high accuracy. (4) It was chosen over other generic tomato sauces that lacked the 'creamy' component.

ingredients.usda_source_description: Tomatoes, canned, red, ripe, diced (Type: Foundation)
ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 333281 (Tomatoes, canned, red, ripe, diced) because: (1) It is a Foundation data type, which is highly reliable for basic ingredients. (2) The description 'diced' directly matches the form of tomatoes observed in the pasta salad. (3) While the original ingredient was 'raw', canned diced tomatoes are compositionally very similar and commonly used in pasta salads, providing an accurate representation. (4) It was preferred over 'crushed' or 'whole' tomato entries due to its specific diced form.

ingredients.usda_source_description: Cheese, feta, whole milk, crumbled (Type: Foundation)
ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 2259796 (Cheese, feta, whole milk, crumbled) because: (1) It is a Foundation data type, providing high-quality data for a basic ingredient. (2) The description 'feta' and 'crumbled' perfectly matches the observed cheese in the pasta salad. (3) This FDC ID accurately reflects the type and form of cheese present. (4) It was preferred over other branded feta entries due to its Foundation data type and explicit 'crumbled' description.
